name: Ladybird
title: ladybird.org
shortDescription: Ladybird is a new, non-profit backed web browser being developed from scratch. It focuses on rendering the modern web with high performance, stability, and security, without relying on existing browser engines. Initially an HTML viewer for SerenityOS, it now supports multiple Unix-like systems. Ideal for users and developers seeking an open, unmonetized web experience.
pros: No default search deals or user monetization
Focus on web standards and security
cons: Still in early development, release expected in 2026
Limited features compared to established browsers
Potential lack of compatibility with all web standards initially
